DOC.brief_summary: Huangkui Capsule is a single medicament of traditional Chinese medicine consists of Abelmoschus manihot and has been widely used to treat kidney disease. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Abelmoschus manihot for treating chronic kidney disease in large scale samples with long time take.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Abelmoschus Manihot for Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The test has not been completed.
